name: Midlight Demo
description:
Midlight is a story driven puzzle platformer about a small group of friends at the end of summer. Some strange things have happened to the small town and it is up to a group of friends to figure it out. Stumble your way through the dark to find the truth.

This game is still in development. 

This game was made using Game Maker Studio 2 game engine.
